document_data.name: '''Poison'''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Poison''''' was a type of [[giant]] rune that allowed the caster to detect [[poison]] in liquids.
document_data.Effects: If an inscribed vessel came into contact with any form of poison it would instantly burst and shatter, thereby alerting those nearby to the poison's presence.
document_data.Components: Like most giant runes, it required no [[material component]]s to cast. The process of shaping this rune could take anywhere from one to four hours. The rune needed to be inscribed upon a liquid-bearing vessel, such as a plate, dish, bowl, [[mug]], or glass.
document_data.Usage: The '''poison''' rune was known to be used extensively by many giant leaders, as they wanted to remain vigilant against any chance of treachery.
